name: Urisis the Game: An Indie Game Project for the Ouya Console!
blurb: This is Urisis The Darkthrone, a one man mission to bring retro to an epic level, for the OUYA game console.  Yes!

rewards.reward: THANKS BUDDY - Get your name on the credits screen,  and give me a pic of yourself I'll shrink it and I'll include it near your name.

THE DOWNLOAD - With this reward you will be given the non physical copy of the game for both the PC, and the new Ouya game console.  The game will include a level editor for the PC and most probably for the Ouya.

CODES AND SECRETS/LIMITED NUMBERED AND SIGNED POSTER - This reward will get your hands on the non physical copies along with the bonus CODES and SECRETS e-mail.  This e-mail well get you new unseen characters,  intros,  secrets, levels and goodies.  I'm including a signed and numbered poster also!!!

GET URISIS FOR ANDROID/POSTER - Yup I now will offer an export to the android modules.  Play Urisis on your android tablet,  your phone...\r\nReceive a signed and numbered poster of a randomly picked warrior in the game.

THE HOMEMADE FIGURINE - With this you will be sent a homemade figurine of any one of the main characters in the game of your choosing.  It will be painted with acrylic paints and will be approximately 6 inches high.  You will also be given copies of the non-physical versions of the game for both PC and the Ouya.

THE URISIS BOXED - Here you will receive the Limited Edition physical copies of the game.  This boxed edition comes with a fully illustrated manual presented in a comic book fashion.  I'm going to go all out on this reward.  The manual will include codes, special concept illustrations, and instructions to the game.  The PC-CD ROM will be included along with the Ouya version on a USB drive.

CREATE YOUR WARRIOR - Everything the 10 dollar reward section offers,  plus you'll get a chance to help me create a specific character.  The character will wield a weapon,  throw a projectile,  and have unique animations.  Your name and other adjacent info will be shown,  along with a personal avatar.

THE LIFETIME BLOODSHADOW GAMES SUBSCRIPTION - I will now offer a lifetime subscription to all my future games for the Ouya.  I will also include everything in the $50 dollar special boxed edition award.  Plus I will send you yet ANOTHER non-physical copy of Ninja Bros,  a remake of a game I have created around 10 years ago for the PC as token of my appreciation.

THE GOD PACK - You'll receive everything in the $50 bundle, but you'll also get the official music soundtrack,  dubbed in high quality and will include hidden and bonus tracks.  Plus you will get an official signed and numbered illustration of any one of the many characters included in the game.  The drawing will be made in full scale anatomy and beautifully done in pastels.

THE CREATE A WARRIOR BOX PACK - With this you will receive the boxed special edition physical copies of the game for both the Ouya and PC,  including the "comic book" manual.  You'll also get to create a specific character for Urisis the Darkthrone and you will receive a special signed and numbered promo poster of that specific character.  I'll even throw in some of the early layouts.

THE CUSTOM PLUSH TOY/CREATE A WARRIOR MEGA PACK - Its all right here,  you'll get to add your own personal warrior to the Urisis lineup and you'll get your own personal bendy plush toy of the same likeness.  I'll need a few original references.  The character will wield a weapon, throw a projectile, and have unique animations. Your name and other adjacent info will be shown, along with a personal avatar in the game.  Plus you'll get the non-physical downloads for both the Ouya and the PC.
